item.title: Insert shebang
item.description: State “DONE” from “TODO” [2019-12-30 Mon 22:59] In this post, I plan to record some shebangs I use frequently. The insert-shabang package is used. shebang collections shell python julia r wls fortran(unsolved) #!/usr/local/bin/env bash #!/usr/local/bin/env python3 #!/usr/local/bin/env julia #!/usr/bin/env Rscript #!/usr/bin/env wolframscript
